(6/2022)We are holding the second workshop on "HI/ESDiT collaboration on AI, human values and the law" in HHAI Conference. (5/2022)We received Utrecht Education Incentive Fund for our project on UU Open Source Investigations Lab. The project will run for three years. (5/2022)We will present our work (w/ Nadin Kokciyan) on making privacy decisions based on situations in IJCAI-ECAI 2022. Check out the project page. (5/2022)We are looking for a postdoc to work on the science of Hybrid Intelligence. Details here! (Close date: 21/2/2022)We received Seed Funding from Transforming Cities - Pathways to Sustainability for our project "Using Multi-Agent Systems for Simulating Online Social Network Influence on Urban Planning". Joint work with Dr. Yanliu Lin.  We are looking for two motivated MS students!
